name: Category of Posts
author: Linda MacPhee-Cobb

sections.description:
This will create a list of all your posts in one specific category. They will be ordered alphabetically by category.
You can put this as a list in your side bar.
sections.installation:
1) Download, unzip, upload to your plugin directory and active the plugin.

2) Open categoryofposts.php in a text editor like notepad ( NOT WORD! ).

3) Go to Admin->Options->Category of Posts and enter the number of the category you wish to list

4) Add the following code to your sidebar:
sections.faq:
If you need more information try here:
http://herselfswebtools.com/2007/10/here-is-a-quick-way-to-print-a-list-of-all-your-posts-by-category-in-wordpress.html
